name: Lidothol
indications: lidothol gel indicated relief pain associated arthritis , backache , cramps , discomfort , neckache , soreness , sprains , strains . applied intact skin .
contraindications: lidothol gel contraindicated patients known history sensitivity local anesthetics amide type , component product .
warningsAndPrecautions: lidothol gel available following : 1 tube , 3.5oz/99g ndc : 80425-0516-01 store 25°c ( 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15°-30°c ( 59°-86°f ) . [ usp controlled room temperature ] .
indications_original: Lidothol Gel is indicated for relief of pain associated with arthritis, backache, cramps, discomfort, neckache, soreness, sprains, strains. It should be applied only to intact skin.
contraindications_original: Lidothol Gel is contraindicated in patients with a known history of sensitivity to local anesthetics of the amide type, or to any other component of the product.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Lidothol Gel is available as the following:
                  1 tube, 3.5oz/99g NDC: 80425-0516-01
                  
                  Store at 25°C (77°F); excursions permitted to 15°-30°C (59°-86°F). [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
